item.title: Lets Clone the Voice of Priyanka Chopra Jonas
item.description: I had decided to get my email reminders using any celebrity’s voice in my previous post Alexa AI for reminding important emails and reminders. Here is a small step towards it :D If you don’t know how Priyanka Chopra sounds like, here is a real sample Sample synthesized voice 1 Sample synthesized voice 2 Sample synthesized voice 3 Real voice of Amitabh Bachchan Sample synthesized voice for Amitabh Bachchan This one is more robotic.
